<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sandals of the Stag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2142)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn sandals

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These sturdy leather sandals feature straps that wrap up to the knees. Etched in the leather are intricate patterns of stags leaping through the forest. You gain a +5-foot item bonus to your land Speed and a +3 item bonus on [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks when attempting to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37). When you invest the sandals, you either increase your Strength score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
